subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Okay, I did it.
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-1242116015-1195677041=:5850
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit


   
  I know that makes ya happy Ann so Im happy for you.
   
  Til then you can give some of the other methods a shot. Sweep tuning is very "box" like tho I think Frank and I agree it often is much more flowing and produces some amazing results without being confined to a box. The effort on his part to incorporate it into the new boxes seems to be working out well.
   
  ST, h2o, music, box, silence... many methods we can go by, yet I tend to get some of the same voices coming thru no matter what I choose. 
   
  Misty
   
  

Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
          I just preordered a minibox.

In January, looks like, I will finally get my chance to play, too. ;)

Ann
